questions.question: They have ears
questions.actual: Snakes lack external ears, but they can sense vibrations and sound through their jawbones

questions.question: Some breeds give birth to live young
Rattlesnakes can be found in Europe
questions.actual: Rattlesnakes are primarily found in the Americas

questions.question: The most venomus breed is the king cobra
questions.actual: The inland taipan holds the title for the most venomous snake

questions.question: They need external sources to regulate their body temperature
All l constrictor snakes are non-venomous
questions.actual: Western terrestrial garter, South American massuranas,some species of Asian Boiga, some Australian elapids and colubrids are all constrictors that are venomus

questions.question: They need to eat at least once a week
questions.actual: They can goo sevral weeks whithout eating

questions.question: They can regrow lost body parts like tails
questions.actual: They cannot regrow lost body parts like tails, unlike some other reptiles

questions.question: The longest venomus breed is the Black Mamba
questions.actual: The longest breed is the King cobra
